00015 VehicleModel::VehicleModel(void)
00016 {
00017         try
00018         {
00019                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();  // Initialize Xerces infrastructure
00020         }
00021         catch( XMLException& e )
00022         {
00023                 char* message = XMLString::transcode( e.getMessage() );
00024                 cerr << "XML toolkit initialization error: " << message << endl;
00025                 XMLString::release( &message );
00026                 // throw exception here to return ERROR_XERCES_INIT
00027         }
00028         m_ConfigFileParser = new XercesDOMParser;
00029         this->loadElementNames();

00035 void VehicleModel::save(vector<Shape> shapes, string filename, const char* name){
00036         ofstream myfile;
00037         if(filename.length() == 0 || name == NULL){
00038                 return;
00039         }
00040         myfile.open (filename.c_str());
00041         myfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" << endl;
00042         myfile << "<root>" << endl;
00043         myfile << "<vehicle id=\""<< name << "\">" << endl;
00044         for(int i=0; i < shapes.size(); i++){
00045 
00046                 Shape s = shapes.at(i);
00047 
00048 
00049 
00050                 if(s.name == "connector" || s.name == "notconnector"){
00051                         vector<LineSegment> line = s.getShape();
00052                         LineSegment l = line.at(0);
00053                         myfile << "             <connector id=\"" << s.name << "\" " << "positionOne=\"" << 
00054                                 l.pointNumberOne <<"\" "<< "positionTwo=\"" << l.pointNumberTwo <<"\" " ">" << endl;
00055                         //myfile << "<p>" << l.pointNumberOne << "</p>" << "<p>" << l.pointNumberTwo << "</p>" << endl;
00056                         myfile << "             </connector>" << endl;
00057                 }
00058                 else if(s.name == "Motor"){
00059                         myfile << "             <Motor " << "position=\"" << s.location.pointNumber << "\" "<< ">" << endl;
00060                         //myfile << "<p>" << s.location.pointNumber << "</p>" << endl; 
00061                         myfile << "             </Motor>" << endl;
00062                 }else{
00063                         myfile << "             <sensor id=\"" << s.name << "\" " << "position=\"" << s.location.pointNumber <<"\" "<< ">" << endl;
00064                         //myfile << "<p>" << s.location.pointNumber << "</p>" << endl; 
00065                         myfile << "             </sensor>" << endl;
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         myfile << "</vehicle>" << endl;
00069         myfile << "</root>" << endl;
00070         myfile.close();
00071 }

00073 void VehicleModel::load(VehicleDrawWindow *view, string configFile){
00074         // Test to see if the file is ok.
00075 
00076         struct stat fileStatus;
00077 
00078         int iretStat = stat(configFile.c_str(), &fileStatus);
00079         if( iretStat == ENOENT )
00080                 throw ( std::runtime_error("Path file_name does not exist, or path is an empty string.") );
00081         else if( iretStat == ENOTDIR )
00082                 throw ( std::runtime_error("A component of the path is not a directory."));
00083         //else if( iretStat == ELOOP )
00084         //throw ( std::runtime_error("Too many symbolic links encountered while traversing the path."));
00085         else if( iretStat == EACCES )
00086                 throw ( std::runtime_error("Permission denied."));
00087         else if( iretStat == ENAMETOOLONG )
00088                 throw ( std::runtime_error("File can not be read\n"));
00089 
00090         // Configure DOM parser.
00091 
00092         m_ConfigFileParser->setValidationScheme( XercesDOMParser::Val_Never );
00093         m_ConfigFileParser->setDoNamespaces( false );
00094         m_ConfigFileParser->setDoSchema( false );
00095         m_ConfigFileParser->setLoadExternalDTD( false );
00096         try
00097         {
00098                 if(configFile == "")return;
00099                 m_ConfigFileParser->parse( configFile.c_str() );
00100 
00101                 // no need to free this pointer - owned by the parent parser object
00102                 xmlDoc = m_ConfigFileParser->getDocument();
00103 
00104 
00105                 view->shapes.clear();
00106 
00107                 // using XMLUtils.h as a dirty way to break up some of this code
00108                 // will refactor later
00109 
00110                 /******************************************************************
00111                 *******************************************************************
00112                 ACTUAL PARSING STARTS
00113                 *******************************************************************
00114                 ******************************************************************/
00115         }
00116         catch( xercesc::XMLException& e )
00117         {
00118                 char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode( e.getMessage() );
00119                 ostringstream errBuf;
00120                 errBuf << "Error parsing file: " << message << flush;
00121                 XMLString::release( &message );
00122         }
00123 
00124 
00125         // Get the top-level element: NAme is "root". No attributes for "root"
00126         DOMElement* elementRoot = xmlDoc->getDocumentElement();
00127         if( !elementRoot ) throw(std::runtime_error( "empty XML document" ));
00128 
00129         vehicles = elementRoot->getElementsByTagName(TAG_vehicle);
00130         const  XMLSize_t vehicleNodeCount = vehicles->getLength();
00131         cout << "num vehicles: " << vehicles->getLength() << endl;
00132         for( XMLSize_t xxx = 0; xxx < vehicleNodeCount; ++xxx )
00133         {
00134                 // Open each Vehicle
00135                 currentVehicle = vehicles->item(xxx);
00136                 currentVehicleElement = dynamic_cast< xercesc::DOMElement* >( currentVehicle );
00137                 vehicleName  = currentVehicleElement->getAttribute(id);
00138                 m_OptionA = XMLString::transcode(vehicleName);
00139                 //cout << "vehicle one name: " << m_OptionA << endl;
00140                 loadSensors(view , xxx);
00141                 loadConnectors(view, xxx);
00142                 loadMotors(view , xxx);
00143         }
00144 
00145         view->redraw();
00146 }

00152 void VehicleModel::loadElementNames(){
00153         // Tags and attributes used in XML file.
00154         // Can't call transcode till after Xerces Initialize()
00155 
00156         TAG_root        = XMLString::transcode("root");
00157         TAG_vehicle = XMLString::transcode("vehicle");
00158         TAG_sensor = XMLString::transcode("sensor");
00159         TAG_connector = XMLString::transcode("connector");
00160         TAG_notconnector = XMLString::transcode("notconnector");
00161         TAG_Motor = XMLString::transcode("Motor");
00162         id = XMLString::transcode("id");
00163         position = XMLString::transcode("position");
00164         positionOne = XMLString::transcode("positionOne");
00165         positionTwo = XMLString::transcode("positionTwo");
00166         Motor = XMLString::transcode("Motor");
00167 }
00168 void VehicleModel::loadSensors(VehicleDrawWindow* view, XMLSize_t xxx){
00169         try{
00170 
00171 
00172                 // Open each sensor
00173                 DOMNodeList*   sensors = currentVehicleElement->getElementsByTagName(TAG_sensor);
00174                 const  XMLSize_t sensorNodeCount = sensors->getLength();
00175                 //cout << "num sensors: " << sensors->getLength() << endl;
00176                 for( XMLSize_t xxx = 0; xxx < sensorNodeCount; ++xxx )
00177                 {
00178                         DOMNode* currentsensor = sensors->item(xxx);
00179                         DOMElement* currentsensorElement = dynamic_cast< xercesc::DOMElement* >( currentsensor );
00180 
00181                         const XMLCh* sensorName  = currentsensorElement->getAttribute(id);
00182                         m_OptionA = XMLString::transcode(sensorName);
00183                         //cout << "sensor name: " << m_OptionA << endl;
00184                         view->currentShape = m_OptionA;
00185 
00186                         const XMLCh* sensorValue  = currentsensorElement->getAttribute(position);
00187                         m_OptionB = XMLString::transcode(sensorValue);
00188                         //cout << "sensor value: " << m_OptionB << endl;
00189                         string newPosition = m_OptionB;
00190                         istringstream buffer(newPosition);
00191                         int some_int;
00192                         buffer >> some_int;
00193                         view->addShape(view->snapPoints.at(some_int));
00194                 }
00195         }
00196         catch( xercesc::XMLException& e )
00197         {
00198                 char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode( e.getMessage() );
00199                 ostringstream errBuf;
00200                 errBuf << "Error parsing file: " << message << flush;
00201                 XMLString::release( &message );
00202         }
00203 }

00205 void VehicleModel::loadConnectors(VehicleDrawWindow* view, XMLSize_t xxx){
00206         try{
00207                 // Open each connector
00208                 DOMNodeList*   connectors = currentVehicleElement->getElementsByTagName(TAG_connector);
00209                 const  XMLSize_t connectorNodeCount = connectors->getLength();
00210                 cout << "num connectors: " << connectors->getLength() << endl;
00211                 for( XMLSize_t xxx = 0; xxx < connectorNodeCount; ++xxx )
00212                 {
00213                         DOMNode* currentconnector = connectors->item(xxx);
00214                         DOMElement* currentconnectorElement = dynamic_cast< xercesc::DOMElement* >( currentconnector );
00215 
00216                         const XMLCh* connectorName  = currentconnectorElement->getAttribute(id);
00217                         m_OptionA = XMLString::transcode(connectorName);
00218                         cout << "connector name: " << m_OptionA << endl;
00219                         view->currentShape = m_OptionA;
00220 
00221                         const XMLCh* connectorOne  = currentconnectorElement->getAttribute(positionOne);
00222                         m_OptionB = XMLString::transcode(connectorOne);
00223 
00224                         string sp1 = m_OptionB;
00225                         istringstream buffer(sp1);
00226                         int p1;
00227                         buffer >> p1;
00228                         cout << "p1: " << p1 << endl;
00229                         int pindex1;
00230                         for(int i=0; i < view->snapPoints.size(); i++){
00231                                 Point2D p = view->snapPoints.at(i);
00232                                 if(p.pointNumber == p1){
00233                                         pindex1 = i;
00234                                 }
00235                         }
00236                         const XMLCh* connectorTwo  = currentconnectorElement->getAttribute(positionTwo);
00237                         m_OptionC = XMLString::transcode(connectorTwo);
00238 
00239                         string sp2 = m_OptionC;
00240                         istringstream buffer2(sp2);
00241                         int p2;
00242                         buffer2 >> p2;
00243                         cout << "p2: " << p2 << endl;
00244                         int pindex2;
00245                         for(int i=0; i < view->snapPoints.size(); i++){
00246                                 Point2D p = view->snapPoints.at(i);
00247                                 if(p.pointNumber == p2){
00248                                         pindex2 = i;
00249                                 }
00250                         }
00251                         vector<LineSegment> newShape;
00252                         newShape.push_back(LineSegment(view->snapPoints.at(pindex1).getX() , view->snapPoints.at(pindex1).getY() , view->snapPoints.at(pindex2).getX(), view->snapPoints.at(pindex2).getY(), view->snapPoints.at(pindex1).pointNumber, view->snapPoints.at(pindex2).pointNumber));
00253                         view->shapes.push_back(Shape(newShape,Point2D(0,0,FL_BLACK ,1,0),view->currentShape));
00254 
00255 
00256                 }
00257         }
00258         catch( xercesc::XMLException& e )
00259         {
00260                 char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode( e.getMessage() );
00261                 ostringstream errBuf;
00262                 errBuf << "Error parsing file: " << message << flush;
00263                 XMLString::release( &message );
00264         }
00265 }

00267 void VehicleModel::loadMotors(VehicleDrawWindow* view , XMLSize_t xxx){
00268         try{
00269                 // Open each Motor
00270                 DOMNodeList*   Motors = currentVehicleElement->getElementsByTagName(TAG_Motor);
00271                 const  XMLSize_t MotorNodeCount = Motors->getLength();
00272                 cout << "num Motors: " << Motors->getLength() << endl;
00273                 for( XMLSize_t xxx = 0; xxx < MotorNodeCount; ++xxx )
00274                 {
00275                         DOMNode* currentMotor = Motors->item(xxx);
00276                         DOMElement* currentMotorElement = dynamic_cast< xercesc::DOMElement* >( currentMotor );
00277 
00278                         view->currentShape = "Motor";
00279 
00280                         const XMLCh* MotorValue  = currentMotorElement->getAttribute(position);
00281                         m_OptionB = XMLString::transcode(MotorValue);
00282                         cout << "sensor value: " << m_OptionB << endl;
00283                         string newPosition = m_OptionB;
00284                         istringstream buffer(newPosition);
00285                         int some_int;
00286                         buffer >> some_int;
00287                         view->addShape(view->snapPoints.at(some_int));
00288 
00289                 }
00290         }
00291         catch( xercesc::XMLException& e )
00292         {
00293                 char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode( e.getMessage() );
